description: This source file implements functions related to constructing, initializing, and managing a CCSP CWMP SOAP parser object. It includes object creation, destruction, object enrollment, and initialization routines, as well as setting up function pointers for SOAP message processing and response building.

classes.name: CCSP_CWMP_SOAP_PARSER_OBJECT
classes.description: The primary object representing the CCSP CWMP SOAP parser instance, containing function pointers and configuration parameters for SOAP message handling.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE CcspCwmpSoappoCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs a new CCSP CWMP SOAP parser object, initializes base object members, and returns a handle to the created object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpSoappoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the specified CCSP CWMP SOAP parser object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpSoappoEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls the necessary subordinate objects required by the SOAP parser object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpSoappoInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the SOAP parser object, sets function pointers for SOAP message processing, and prepares it for operation.
